"Rendering" - what's that? There are various terms which convey how we generate HTML or manipulate the DOM. And they can be confusing. I spent a couple of minutes of this @freeCodeCamp video on JAMstack to describe some popular terms for rendering. https://t.co/tlIpGd1LMF https://t.co/eEnkEHIzaj
